_comment: Options for post-processing. Broadly anything with null values will get default values given by the script
mask_variable_comment: Variable name for the mask field
mask_fraction_comment: Critical Fraction. Specify if mask  is a land/sea fraction. Values >= are land Values < sea. Set to null if mask is a t/f mask
time_range_comment: Start & end time as ISO std string or null for no start or end.
timeseries_comment: If true post processing code will write timeseries out
file_pattern_comment: File pattern to match for post-processing. Normal glob rules
